info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 6 at 8:27PM EDT until April 9 at 3:00AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis IN
info.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana...
White River.
Eel River at Bowling Green.
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana...
White River.
.Significant flooding is already occurring along the White River due to multiple rounds of heavy rainfall that brought around 5 to 9 inches to the area. Major flooding is expected from Spencer downstream on the White. The crest on the upper White should reach Noblesville Monday morning, with much of the middle White cresting Monday and Petersburg and Hazleton not cresting until the end of the week.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...White River near Nora.
* WHEN...Until early Wednesday morning.
* IMPACTS...At 15.3 feet, River Road just north of 86th Street near the Fashion Mall at the entrance to condominiums begins to flood. High water affects Ravenswood and River Edge Drive. Many basements in Ravenswood fill with one to two feet of water. Some basements fill with more than three feet of water.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM EDT Sunday the stage was 14.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 PM EDT Sunday was 14.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 15.2 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind.
The next statement should be issued Monday morning by around 1130 AM EDT /1030 AM CDT/.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY WEDNESDAY MORNING
